content: Panos Parpas - Panos Parpas Professor of Computational and Applied Mathematics Room 357, Huxley Building Department of Computing Imperial College 180 Queen's Gate London SW7 2AZ Email: p.parpas@imperial.ac.uk Phone: +44 (0) 20 7594 8366 Brief bio: I am a Professor of Computational and Applied Mathematics in the Department of Computing at Imperial College London. Before joining Imperial, I was a postdoctoral fellow at MIT.
